text: @Mike_Pence Why do you guys lie? What’s next, Biden supports the boogeyman, space aliens, and Thanos? Is he going to “turn” everyone gay once he wins? Abortion has never been federally funded. If you care so much about lives how about trying something - anything - to combat the Coronavirus?
